name: Small Pillow Memory Foam Bed Mini Pillows Soft Cooling Cover Lightweight Home Pillow for Travel, Camping, Sleeping, Nap and Neck, Lumbar Support Ideal Home Backpacking, Airplane and Car (Gray)
short_description: 【Ideal Small Pillow Size】This compact travel camping pillow measures 13x 8 x 3.5 inches, making it lightweight and easy to carry. Its small size allows it to fit in your bag, making it versatile for various trips like HOME camping, fishing, backpacking, hiking, or lounging in a hammock, on a plane, in a car, RV, at home, on a sofa, folding bed, futon mattress, camping sleeping pad, or under a tent. It promises a great night's sleep no matter where you are.

【Soft and Comfortable Memory Foam】Crafted from high-quality, whole-piece memory foam, our pillow offers excellent breathability and softness. The cover is skin-friendly and breathable, allowing fresh air to circulate, providing comfort similar to being at home. Its ergonomic design fits the body's curves, reducing pressure points for a superior sleep experience on the go.

【Washable Removable Cover】The removable pillowcase can be easily taken off and washed, ensuring your pillow stays fresh and clean. Our pillows are durable and easy to maintain—just remove the cover and toss it in the wash. (Note: Memory foam itself is not washable.)

【Perfect Gifts】Our small pillows for sleeping make ideal gifts for adventure seekers and travelers. Give the gift of a good night's sleep for occasions like Christmas, Father’s Day, New Year, and more, suitable for both adults and children.

【Lifetime Guarantee】We offer a lifetime exchange and refund service. If you're not completely satisfied with your travel pillow, please contact us. We are committed to providing a prompt response within 24 hours.

name: TREKOLOGY Ultralight Inflatable Camping Travel Pillow - ALUFT 2.0 Compressible, Compact, Comfortable, Ergonomic Inflating Pillows for Neck & Lumbar Support While Camp, Hiking, Backpacking

Imported

COMPACT & LIGHTWEIGHT: This ultralight inflatable pillow folds down to 5x2 inches, smaller than a soda can, and inflates for head or lumbar support. Weighing only 3.9oz(110g), it's easy to carry in your backpack or pocket for camping, hiking, or travel.
DURABLE 2.0 DESIGN: Made with highly durable elastic TPU fabric that’s water-resistant, this pillow is built to withstand outdoor adventures, from mountain campsites to hotel stays.

NO-SLIP COMFORT: Featuring anti-slip dots and a latch strap, the Aluft 2.0 pillow stays in place on sleeping mats, preventing it from sliding during the night. Ideal for camping, backpacking, or any outdoor setting.

ERGONOMIC SUPPORT: Designed for superior neck and back support, this ultralight pillow inflates to 16x12x4 inches, providing great neck and back support for camping, hiking, or beach naps. It's the ultimate pillow for sleeping anywhere.

EASY TO INFLATE/DEFLATE: The blow-up pillow inflates with 5-8 breaths, and the quick deflate button releases air in seconds—making this inflatable pillow a breeze to pack. inflate the pillow to your preferred firmness.
VERSATILE USE: Whether it's a camping pillow, beach pillow, or backpacking pillow, this compact pillow fits all your travel and outdoor needs.

product_description: Experience ultimate comfort on your outdoor adventures with the Trekology ALUFT Pro SE pillow, designed to support all types of sleepers with its ergonomic shape and soft, breathable fabric. Perfect for camping, flights, or even a quick nap on the go, this pillow offers customizable firmness thanks to its dual-height core and thick foam layer, ensuring a tailored fit for every user. The one-click push-button valve allows quick inflation in just a few breaths and effortless deflation, while its compact, ultralight design makes it easy to pack for any trip. Built with durable, leak-proof TPU and an adjustable non-slip strap for added stability, this pillow stays in place on any surface, providing reliable rest wherever your journey takes you. Whether for yourself or as a thoughtful gift, the ALUFT Pro SE pillow delivers premium comfort, durability, and value.
